iubenda.title: Does your website comply with privacy regulations?
iubenda.subtitle: All websites and apps must comply with specific legal obligations. Failure to comply can result in penalties of up to 20 million euros or 4% of global annual turnover.
iubenda.partnerBadge: As a Certified iubenda Partner, we offer complete and up-to-date solutions to make your website or app compliant with GDPR, Cookie Law, and other international regulations.
iubenda.privacyPolicyIntro: The law requires every site/app that collects data to inform users through a privacy and cookie policy.
iubenda.privacyItem1: the types of personal data processed
iubenda.privacyItem3: the purposes and methods of processing
iubenda.privacyItem4: the parties to whom data may be communicated
iubenda.privacyItem5: any data transfer outside the EU
iubenda.privacyItem6: the rights of the data subject
iubenda.privacyItem7: the identifying details of the controller
iubenda.cookiePolicyText: The cookie policy describes the types of cookies installed, the third parties they refer to, and the purposes of processing.
iubenda.genericDocQuestion: Can't we use a generic document?
iubenda.genericDocAnswer: Generic documents cannot be used as the privacy notice must describe in detail the data processing carried out by your site/app, also listing all third-party technologies used.
iubenda.noDataQuestion: What if my site doesn't process any data?
iubenda.noDataAnswer: It's very unlikely that your site doesn't process any data. A simple contact form or Google Analytics is enough to trigger the obligation to prepare a privacy notice.
iubenda.cookieBannerIntro: Websites are required to ask for consent before installing non-technical cookies. The cookie banner must allow users to:
iubenda.bannerItem3: Access the privacy and cookie policy
iubenda.benefit1Text: Legal documents always updated to the latest international regulations.
iubenda.benefit2Text: Complete solutions for compliance with GDPR and other privacy regulations.
iubenda.benefit3Text: Simple and fast implementation on any website or application.
iubenda.ctaTitle: Want to make your site compliant?
iubenda.ctaText: Contact me for a consultation on regulatory compliance for your website or app.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.transparencyText: This portfolio does NOT collect, does NOT track, and does NOT store any personal data of users. No profiling cookies, no analytics, no tracking.

privacy.noCollection6: No data shared with third parties
